"Ah ah ah, you can't get away that easily," says Supergirl as she confidently walks toward your corner. "Don't worry. This will all be over soon."

She's caught off guard by this quick move and you are able to lift her up into the air as you lean backwards. The crowd gasps as the Maid of Might is thrown face first into the turnbuckle. "1..."

Up close, you can tell you have done some damage. Supergirl's breathing is labored underneath you and she is glistening with a fine layer of sweat.
